name: places/ChIJq0Ys0o1ZwokRT8rnUOC5KuM
formattedAddress: 636 Hudson St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 636 Hudson St, New York, NY 10014, USA

editorialSummary.text: Swanky showroom offering originally designed rings, necklaces & earrings in modern & vintage styles.

originalText.text:
From the quality of their diamonds to their exceptional customer service, Marisa Perry is the best of the best for finding the perfect engagement ring.

Having been to multiple jewelers including Tiffany's, Harry Winston, and some other boutiques, I was impressed with the selection of Marisa Perry's diamonds and the educational, transparent approach that they take without pressuring or pushing. Nesrine spent 3+ appointments with us to really understand our vision and brought in so many stones to really find that perfect stone..and oh she did! I'm OBSESSED with my ring!

text.text:

originalText.text: I had the extreme pleasure of visiting Marissa and Douglas (and Max) a couple of weeks ago and only wish I had visited them all sooner! I invested in the most gorgeous pair of diamond earrings I could’ve ever imagined owning. The customer service both while in the store, and after I left have been well beyond my expectations. Anyone looking for a fine jewelry purchase should look no further. I will absolutely be back for my future jewelry needs (wants).  Thank you so much for making my dreams come true and for making the entire process not only seamless but also fun! I’m in diamond heaven!

text.text: I had the extreme pleasure of visiting Marissa and Douglas (and Max) a couple of weeks ago and only wish I had visited them all sooner! originalText.text: I am so lucky that my fiancé brought me to Marisa Perry to look at engagement rings!  We met Mila in the spring for our first appointment to help me find the perfect ring! Aside from being a total sweetheart, Mila is extremely educated and was so helpful during the process. She made sure that I tried on all cuts, coloring etc. to make sure I found exactly what I wanted. After I narrowed down color, cut etc. my fiancé took the reigns and he was so glad to have Mila to help him throughout the process! We couldn't have done it without her!  I stare at my ring every and I get stopped daily by people who tell me how gorgeous it is!   Look no further for a jewelry store - Marisa Perry is unmatched!

originalText.text: My fiancé came across Marisa Perry while searching for the perfect engagement boutique. We traveled to NYC together, and had a consultation with Mila. Our experience in the boutique was exceptional and unlike no other. The attention to detail and customized service that Mila and the whole staff provided to us during the process was first-class. We cannot thank Marisa Perry enough for making our dream ring a reality. If you are shopping for an engagement ring, we highly recommend working with Mila and the team at Marisa Perry. The customer service, value, and expertise is out of this world.  - Annette & Max

The customer service, value, and expertise is out of this world.  - Annette & Max

originalText.text:
I have bought a few pieces from here over the past years. Both for my fiancée (now wife :) and myself. Working with the team at Marisa Perry has always been a wonderful experience, they treat me very well and make the entire design and purchasing process very fun. I have been working with Mila for all of my purchases, and they always find time to see me even when they’re very busy at the location.

I will always recommend Marisa Perry for helping me with all of my life’s celebratory occasions and designing pieces that are unique and very eye catching.
